nodes.name: Dignity Fleece Blanket
nodes.description:
Crafted from the same ultra-soft, comfortable fleece as the Dignity Apparel sweatshirts, this 9 oz, 80/20 cotton/poly blend blanket measures 58” x 62” and features rounded corners with contrast stitching. This blanket is both warm and stylish, making it an ideal gift choice!

  • Contrast stitching
  • Customize with your embroidered logo
  • Minimum order of 24
  • Coming soon: Red, Black, Charcoal Heather, Safety Green, Purple, Navy
nodes.shortDescription: This ultra-soft fleece blanket is both warm and stylish, making it an ideal gift choice!

nodes.name: Dignity Safety Long Sleeve Tee
nodes.description:
Combining safety and utility, these ultra-bright, highly visible long-sleeved tees are ideal for intense work environments. Made from a midweight 50/50 cotton/polyester blend, these shirts withstand the rigors of work while keeping you comfortable throughout the day.

  • Tagless union stamp neck label
  • Union-Made Dignity Apparel hem tag
  • 1x1 rib knit neck
  • Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
  • Set-in long sleeves
  • Minimum order of 48
nodes.shortDescription: Combining safety and utility, these ultra-bright, highly visible long-sleeved tees are ideal for intense work environments.

Dignity Safety Pocket Tee
nodes.description:
Combining safety and utility, these ultra-bright, highly visible short-sleeve pocket tees are ideal for intense work environments. Made from a midweight 50/50 cotton/polyester blend, these shirts withstand the rigors of work while keeping you comfortable throughout the day. Pocket sewn on the left chest.

  • Pocket on the left chest
  • Tagless union stamp neck label
  • Union-Made Dignity Apparel hem tag
  • 1x1 rib knit neck
  • Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
  • Set-in sleeves
  • Minimum order of 48

18.2 oz Thermal-Lined Hooded Zip Sweatshirt
nodes.description:
The perfect work jacket replacement. Durable, rugged and able to handle the outdoors and environments where union members are exposed to the elements. Available in Black only.

Made-to-Order Only

  • 144 piece minimum
  • Total weight of 18.2 oz
  • 6.2 oz thermal lining
  • Generous waistband, cuffs and body length
  • Crossover detailed hood
  • Suitable for print or embroidery
nodes.shortDescription: Durable, rugged and able to handle the outdoors and environments where union members are exposed to the elements.

12 oz Hooded Full-Zip Sweatshirt
nodes.description:
For the ultimate in warmth, durability, and outdoor/job site performance choose the 12 oz heavyweight 100% cotton zip. Sized generously with a modern fit, with body length, waistbands, and cuffs designed to never ride up.

  • Generous waistband, cuffs, and body length
  • Crossover detailed hood
  • Modern fit
  • Suitable for print or embroidery
  • Dignity Apparel hem tag on pocket
nodes.shortDescription: For the ultimate in warmth, durability, and outdoor/job site performance choose the 12 oz heavyweight 100% cotton zip.

Quarter-Zip Fleece Pullover
nodes.description:
With the material of a fleece but style of office wear, the 1⁄4 zip pullover is a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Its laydown collar makes it ideal for meetings, while its traditional fit and 9 oz fabric ensures warmth and comfort all day.

  • Suitable for embroidery or print
  • Charcoal Heather, Navy, and Red are Made-to-Order colors
  • 72 piece minimum for all Made-to-Order colors
nodes.shortDescription: With the material of a fleece but style of office wear, the 1⁄4 zip pullover is a versatile addition to any wardrobe.

9 oz Hooded Full-Zip Sweatshirt
nodes.description:
Our 9 oz, hooded full zip sweatshirt is super-soft, breathable, and comfortable. The fabric makes this garment appropriate across a wide variety of temperatures and climates. Sized generously with a modern fit, with body length, waistbands, and cuffs designed to never ride up.

  • Generous waistband, cuffs, and body length
  • Crossover detailed hood
  • Modern fit
  • Suitable for print or embroidery
  • Dignity Apparel hem tag on pocket

Ladies' Performance Polo
nodes.description:
The Performance Polo is the workhorse of the Dignity Apparel polo line. With a more robust material, the performance polo is made to be worn every day, whether in contract negotiations or out on the job site, by itself or layered under a jacket or other outerwear.

  • Self-fabric collar
  • Color-matched buttons
  • Dignity Apparel hem tag
nodes.shortDescription: The Performance Polo is the workhorse of the Dignity Apparel polo line.

nodes.name: Men's Performance Polo
nodes.description:
The Performance Polo is the workhorse of the Dignity Apparel polo line. With a more robust material, the performance polo is made to be worn every day, whether in contract negotiations or out on the job site, by itself or layered under a jacket or other outerwear.

  • Self-fabric collar
  • Color-matched buttons
  • Dignity Apparel hem tag
nodes.shortDescription: The Performance Polo is the workhorse of the Dignity Apparel polo line.

nodes.name: Ladies' Sullivan Polo
nodes.description:
Soft, moisture-wicking, and wrinkle-resistant, the Sullivan polo was designed with your comfort in mind. Perfect for spring and summer conferences and events, and looks just as good at a picnic as in an office setting. Lightweight, breathable, and with a unique striped pattern that can only be found on this 100% union-made polo.

  • Self-fabric collar
  • Color-matched buttons
  • Dignity Apparel hem tag
nodes.shortDescription: Soft, moisture-wicking, and wrinkle-resistant, the Sullivan polo was designed with your comfort in mind.

nodes.name: Men's Sullivan Polo
nodes.description:
Soft, moisture-wicking, and wrinkle-resistant, the Sullivan polo was designed with your comfort in mind. Perfect for spring and summer conferences and events, and looks just as good at a picnic as in an office setting. Lightweight, breathable, and with a unique striped pattern that can only be found on this 100% union-made polo.

  • Self-fabric collar
  • Color-matched buttons
  • Dignity Apparel hem tag
nodes.shortDescription: Soft, moisture-wicking, and wrinkle-resistant, the Sullivan polo was designed with your comfort in mind.

nodes.name: Ladies Tunic Tee
nodes.description:
After years of requests, we’re thrilled to offer a fun, new, union-made ladies’ shirt! Comfortable and stylish, the cuffed sleeves, open neck, and curved drape cut is flattering to all different body types. Designed to be worn tucked in, untucked, or tied off to the side. Ladies looking for a feminine cut will love this style, and the 100% fine cotton jersey fabric allows it to be paired with a unisex tee order with the same design!

  • Tagless printed label
  • Best for print, recommend 1-2 color design for maximum visual impact
nodes.shortDescription: Comfortable and stylish, the cuffed sleeves, open neck, and curved drape cut is flattering to all different body types.

nodes.name: Dignity Comfort Tee
nodes.description:
Welcome to the most comfortable, breathable union-made shirt on the market. This lightweight, tri-blend tee combines polyester, modal, and cotton for the best in softness, flexibility, and color fastness. Try it and see if it isn’t your members’ new favorite shirt.

  • Tagless union stamp neck label
  • Union-Made Dignity Apparel hem tag
  • 1x1 rib knit neck
  • Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
  • Set-in sleeves
nodes.shortDescription: Welcome to the most comfortable, breathable union-made shirt on the market.

Dignity Premium Tee
nodes.description:
For an upgraded experience, try our Dignity Apparel Premium Tee. Crafted from heavier-weight ringspun cotton, this shirt has a distinctive, full-bodied softness that feels great to wear. This tee is perfect for the workplace or for relaxing on the weekend.

  • Tagless union stamp neck label
  • Union-Made Dignity Apparel hem tag
  • 1x1 rib knit neck
  • Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
  • Set-in sleeves
  • Minimum order of 48
nodes.shortDescription: For an upgraded experience, try our Dignity Apparel Premium Tee.

Dignity Everyday Tee
nodes.description:
Sturdy construction and reinforced seams give the Everyday Tee a rugged durability, and the timeless design makes it the go-to option for events. Best
of all, from the knitting and cutting of the material, through our sewing lines, to our high-quality decoration process, this shirt is 100% made with union labor to ensure the very best in quality.

  • Tagless union stamp neck label
  • Union-Made Dignity Apparel hem tag
  • 1x1 rib knit neck
  • Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
  • Set-in sleeves
  • Minimum order of 48
nodes.shortDescription: Sturdy construction and reinforced seams give the Everyday Tee a rugged durability, and the timeless design makes it the go-to option for events.
